main event: A witness reported seeing a round light in the sky over Brooklyn, New York on March 8, 1965.
interesting points: The light was described as looking like a star drifting in the sky., The observation was reported as a ground-visual type., No additional details on the object's movement were provided by the witness., The report concluded there was insufficient information to identify the object., There were no photographs or physical evidence accompanying the report.
witness description: the witness observed the light from the ground
